value.string:
module("tinymce.plugins.Autosave", {\n \tsetupModule: function() {\n \t\tQUnit.stop();\n \n \t\ttinymce.init({\n \t\t\tselector: "textarea",\n \t\t\tadd_unload_trigger: false,\n \t\t\tskin: false,\n \t\t\tplugins: \'autosave\',\n \t\t\tautosave_ask_before_unload: false,\n \t\t\tinit_instance_callback: function(ed) {\n \t\t\t\twindow.editor = ed;\n \t\t\t\teditor.plugins.autosave.removeDraft();\n \t\t\t\tQUnit.start();\n \t\t\t}\n \t\t});\n \t}\n });\n \n test("isEmpty true", function() {\n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'\'));\n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\' \'));\n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'\\t\\t\\t\'));\n \n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'

\'));\n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'

\'));\n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'

\'));\n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'

\\t

\'));\n \n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'


\'));\n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'


\'));\n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'


\'));\n \n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'



\'));\n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'



\'));\n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'



\'));\n });\n \n test("isEmpty false", function() {\n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'X\'));\n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\' X\'));\n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'\\t\\t\\tX\'));\n \n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'

X

\'));\n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'

X

\'));\n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'

\\tX

\'));\n \n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'


X

\'));\n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'


X

\'));\n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'


X

\'));\n \n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'



X

\'));\n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'



X

\'));\n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'



X

\'));\n \n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'

\'));\n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.isEmpty(\'\'));\n });\n \n test("hasDraft/storeDraft/restoreDraft", function() {\n \tok(!editor.plugins.autosave.hasDraft());\n \n \teditor.setContent(\'X\');\n \teditor.undoManager.add();\n \teditor.plugins.autosave.storeDraft();\n \n \tok(editor.plugins.autosave.hasDraft());\n \n \teditor.setContent(\'Y\');\n \teditor.undoManager.add();\n \n \teditor.plugins.autosave.restoreDraft();\n \tequal(editor.getContent(), \'

X

\');\n });\n
